entry.title: paulgeorge35/hooks: A lightweight TypeScript library that provides a set of commonly used React hooks to enhance your components with powerful functionality.

entry.title: Victiniiiii/SushiReminder: Very lightweight reminder app using React + Tauri, with drag and drop, notifications, tray icon and global shortcuts.
entry.content: Very lightweight reminder app using React + Tauri, with drag and drop, notifications, tray icon and global shortcuts.

entry.title: LearnSmartyHQ/word-vault-audio: Word Vault Audio: A lightweight library of English word pronunciations, featuring high-quality audio files for educational and reference purposes.
entry.content: Word Vault Audio: A lightweight library of English word pronunciations, featuring high-quality audio files for educational and reference purposes.

entry.title: mask-shakill/blog-api-elysia: A lightweight and efficient REST API for managing blog posts, built with the Elysia framework. This project demonstrates how to set up a blog backend with Elysia and includes routes for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog entries.
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient REST API for managing blog posts, built with the Elysia framework. This project demonstrates how to set up a blog backend with Elysia and includes routes for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog entries.

entry.title: sepehra/3DViewer: A lightweight 3D viewer for streaming data rendition generated by a topology optimization kernel running on a Julia runtime server.
entry.content: A lightweight 3D viewer for streaming data rendition generated by a topology optimization kernel running on a Julia runtime server.

entry.title: kiwix/kiwix-js: Fully portable & lightweight ZIM reader in Javascript
entry.content: Fully portable & lightweight ZIM reader in Javascript

entry.content: A lightweight module for integrating Yandex.Metrika into Nuxt, enabling easy analytics setup and tracking user interactions

entry.title: miniapp-tool/mptool: A lightweight miniprogram framework
entry.content: A lightweight miniprogram framework

entry.title: Voyrox/BlazeDB: BlazeDB is a blazing fast NoSQL database built for modern applications. It provides a lightweight and easy-to-use data storage solution that is designed to scale with your application.
entry.content: BlazeDB is a blazing fast NoSQL database built for modern applications. It provides a lightweight and easy-to-use data storage solution that is designed to scale with your application.

entry.title: enrickaliberti/Autocomplete.js: Autocomplete.js is a lightweight and highly customizable library for adding autocomplete functionality to input fields. Ideal for improving the usability of your web applications and providing users with a smooth and responsive experience.
entry.content: Autocomplete.js is a lightweight and highly customizable library for adding autocomplete functionality to input fields. Ideal for improving the usability of your web applications and providing users with a smooth and responsive experience.

entry.title: almond-bongbong/react-simple-toasts: 🍞 Instant, lightweight toast notifications for React. No providers or containers needed.
entry.content: 🍞 Instant, lightweight toast notifications for React. No providers or containers needed.

entry.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.
entry.content: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.

entry.title: suchipi/pheno: Simple, lightweight at-runtime type checking functions, with full TypeScript support
entry.content: Simple, lightweight at-runtime type checking functions, with full TypeScript support

entry.title: fix2015/no-sleep-app: NoSleepJs is a lightweight JavaScript library that prevents devices from going to sleep during critical activities. It uses the Screen Wake Lock API or a fallback video playback method to keep the screen active, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences across modern and legacy devices.
entry.content: NoSleepJs is a lightweight JavaScript library that prevents devices from going to sleep during critical activities. It uses the Screen Wake Lock API or a fallback video playback method to keep the screen active, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences across modern and legacy devices.

entry.title: bent10/qekit: A lightweight and chainable library for easy DOM manipulation in modern browsers.
entry.content: A lightweight and chainable library for easy DOM manipulation in modern browsers.

entry.title: martinmanu/theme-labs: "ThemeLab is a lightweight, configurable theming library to help you manage and apply themes in your app. Developed for easy use in any frontend framework or libraries with direct focus on development ease in setting up a fully fledged configurable themes for your application."
entry.content: "ThemeLab is a lightweight, configurable theming library to help you manage and apply themes in your app. Developed for easy use in any frontend framework or libraries with direct focus on development ease in setting up a fully fledged configurable themes for your application."

entry.title: typemill/typemill: Typemill is a lightweight, flat-file CMS designed for simple, fast, and flexible website and eBook creation using Markdown.
entry.content: Typemill is a lightweight, flat-file CMS designed for simple, fast, and flexible website and eBook creation using Markdown.

entry.title: nezanuha/markdown-text-editor: A simple, lightweight Markdown editor with real-time preview. Write and edit Markdown content effortlessly, with support for syntax highlighting
entry.content: A simple, lightweight Markdown editor with real-time preview. Write and edit Markdown content effortlessly, with support for syntax highlighting
